document_data.mainbody:
Hourm was a friendly galeb duhr living in Gravenhollow in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, Hourm assisted an expedition led by some adventurers whod been hired by Bruenor Battlehammer to investigate the threat of a demon lord. Hourm explained to them the functions and rules of the library. After he finished his task, he remerged with a wall.
